titles.title: A concurrent resolution to authorize a correction in the enrollment of S. 508.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/7/1988--Introduced. Corrects the enrollment of S. 508 (Whistleblower Protection Act of 1988).
